entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@realDonaldTrump NY Gov. Andrew Cuomo warns Pres. Trump to avoid partisan politics in coronavirus response.
“You want to be a leader in a crisis, then lead…be the bridge above the politics. Don’t get into this partisan fight. It will come back to [you] &you’ll see this nation in real peril”
